TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlAnchor extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler
Public Class HtmlAnchor Inherits HtmlContainerControl Implements IPostBackEventHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种方式使用类。There are two ways to use the class. 第一种是导航： 使用属性来定义页后，可以将链接到的位置。The first is for navigation: using the property to define the location of the page to link to. 第二个是回发事件： 使用事件以编程方式处理用户的单击的链接。The second is for postback events: using the event to programmatically handle the user's clicking a link. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件显示一条消息时控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to display a message when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/CS/htmlanchorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchor/VB/htmlanchorvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例控件。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"A"文本的字符串。The "a" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何动态添加控件添加到 Web 窗体页。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically add an control to the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorConstructor/CS/htmlanchorconstructorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorConstructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorConstructor/VB/htmlanchorconstructorvb.aspx#1)]

Public Overridable Property CausesValidation As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CausesValidation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is clicked.

value.span: 如果在单击 时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，执行页验证时控件被单击。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定控件是否与指定的验证控件的验证规则通过了所有页上的验证控件相关联。Page validation determines whether controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control. 你可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证时通过单击控件属性。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要禁止从正在执行的验证，请设置属性设置为 false。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ HRef { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 服务器控件中指定的链接的 URL 目标。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL target of the link specified in the server control.
The URL target of the link.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的 URL 时链接到控件被单击。Use this property to specify the URL to link to when the control is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定 Web 页后，可以导航到时控件被单击。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a Web page to navigate to when the control is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.HRef Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 服务器控件中定义的书签名。

span.span: Gets or sets the bookmark name defined in the server control.
The bookmark name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来标记在网页上使用名称部分。Use this property to mark a section on a Web page with a name. 这使您可以从任何位置链接到此部分的同一页面上。This allows you to link to this section from anywhere on the same page. 例如，你可以提供将直接链接到页上的标题的页面顶部的目录。For example, you can provide a table of contents at the top of a page that will link directly to topics on the page. 若要链接到标记的部分，请使用控件替换为属性设置为的名称部分，前面带有 # 符号 (\)。To link to a marked section, use an control with the property set to the name of the section, preceded by a # symbol (\). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标记在网页上的不同部分，并将链接到它们从一个表中内容的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to mark different sections on the Web page, and link to them from a table of contents. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Name Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件，显示一条消息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例将上面的示例以编程方式指定和代码的事件处理程序修改事件。The following code example modifies the preceding example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/CS/htmlanchorserverclickcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClick/VB/htmlanchorserverclickvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值属性是一个格式不正确的 URL，方法抛出异常异常。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, the method throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便为始终显示为工具提示，可访问的特定标题文本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific title text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlanchor_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlanchor_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlanchor_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlAnchorRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlanchor_renderattributes.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件被单击。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 此服务器事件会导致出现从客户端到服务器并返回一次往返过程。This server event causes a round trip to occur from the client to the server and back. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定和代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively specify and code an event handler for the event. 当单击控件，显示一条消息。When the control is clicked, a message is displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlAnchorServerClickDeclarative/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例修改前面的示例以编程方式指定和代码的事件处理程序事件。The following code example modifies the previous example to programmatically specify and code an event handler for the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法。The method calls the method. 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当单击 控件时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked.

value.span: 当单击 时，显示所链接到的网页的内容的浏览器窗口或框架。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page linked to when the is clicked.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定目标窗口或框架显示链接到的网页的内容控件被单击。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the contents of the Web page that is linked to when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 属性呈现为`target`属性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`属性`a`XHTML 1.1 文档类型定义中不允许的元素。The `target` attribute on `a` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition. 未设置属性如果呈现的输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be compliant with XHTML 1.1. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 的 XHTML 标准](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 当创建可访问网页，避免使用属性将作为目标另一个窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB: ASP.NET 可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae)。For more information, see [NIB: ASP.NET Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9b5f3e05-e88d-4248-a5f4-9e64850fa0ae). 值必须以字母 a 到 Z （区分大小写），除了下列特殊值，其中以下划线开头范围的开头。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目标值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性向时显示导航页在新的未划分框架窗口中单击控件时。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the page that is navigated to when the control is clicked in a new, unframed window. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Target Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当鼠标指针放在 控件上时所显示的工具提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the ToolTip text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the control.

value.span: 当鼠标指针放置在 控件上时所显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed when the mouse pointer is placed over the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性提供的自定义工具提示控件。Use this property to provide a custom ToolTip for the control. 当鼠标指针停留在该控件时，此文本显示。This text is displayed when the mouse pointer rests over the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性为工具提示中提供自定义文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to provide custom text for the ToolTip. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlAnchor.Title Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时引发验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 验证组允许您将在页面上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于其他页上的验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用属性来为其指定验证组的名称控件回发到服务器时要进行验证。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 属性才起作用时，才的值属性设置为`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 当指定的值属性，只会验证控件且是指定组的一部分时验证控件回发到服务器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值与属性设置为`true`，该控件发回发到服务器时，该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件进行都验证。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
